title: "It Is Not Wrong to Murder" -- Conclusions from Athiests' Conversation
description:
Some commentary on a conversation between @CosmicSkeptic and @RationalityRules. I pulled this in because I thought their conclusion very interesting. They are in essence saying that you can do what you want. 

The Conversation: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=yrYLvaXCokg&t=4927s

This is episode 58 of my podcast. 

My Writing: https://coltonkirby.substack.com/

There is an audio version of my videos (on all podcast platforms): https://anchor.fm/coltonkirby

About Me: https://coltonkirby.substack.com/about?utm_source=menu-dropdown
Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/coltonjkirby/
Twitter: https://twitter.com/_coltonkirby
Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/officialcoltonkirby/
Odysee: https://odysee.com/@ColtonKirby
